Detailed Description

Thread that handles incoming messages from NavComm.

When the thread is idle and waits for requests it waits for a requestmessage to be put into the reqList.

When a requestmessage is processed and it waits for a reply from a navigator putNavigatorReply is called instead.

putNavigatorReply is also called when a timeout occurs.
